inclusion.criterion: homogeneous for number and sex of the subjects
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: randomization in a 1:1 to probiotic intervention group or placebo group
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: standard diet with 55-60% of carbohydrates, 25-30% lipids and 15% proteins
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: physical activity: all subjects will receive general recommendations about performing physical activity
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: timing: patients will be evaluated firstly at time of enrollment (V0) and, at the end of the first part of study (Study 1, V1)
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: biochemical evaluations will be completed after a 12-h overnight fast
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: anthropometric measures: height, weight, body mass index (BMI), waist and hip circumferences
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: blood pressure and heart rate will be measured
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: patients will receive a supplementation of probiotic containing Bifidobacterium breve B632 and Bifidobacterium breve BR03, 15 gtt/die (3x108 CFU/die)
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: patients will receive a placebo for a total of 2 months of treatment
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Adverse reactions to the product or component of the product (allergies…)
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Genetic obesity (Prader Willi syndrome, Down syndrome), Metabolic obesity (Laurence-biedl syndrome…), endocrinological obesity (Cushinch syndrome, hypotiroidism)
exclusion.label: triggers

exclusion.criterion: Chronic diseases, hepatic or gastroenterological diseases
exclusion.label: triggers

exclusion.criterion: Probiotic or prebiotic therapies and antibiotic treatment
exclusion.label: triggers

notes: The patient has lower urinary tract symptoms including frequency, urgency, weak stream, incomplete emptying and intermittent flow for the past 9 months. He is otherwise healthy only using Vit D 1000 units daily.
